N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 602.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply in the following appeal proceedings and
requests for declaratory rulings brought by or before the Office for People

With Developmental Disabilities pursuant to the Mental Hygiene Law and/or
regulations issued pursuant thereto: (a) certificate of need hearings, pursuant to

Mental Hygiene Law, section 16.09 and Part 620 of this Title; (b) hearings requested after denial of
application for or limitation of initial operating certificate, pursuant to

Mental Hygiene Law, section 16.17; (c) hearings on suspension, revocation or
limitation of an operating certificate, or the imposition of a fine on the
holder thereof, pursuant to Mental Hygiene Law, section 16.17; (d) hearings on the denial of the renewal of
an operating certificate, pursuant to Mental Hygiene Law, section
16.17; (e) audit appeal hearings, except appeals of audits pursuant to sections
681.12
and
690.12
respectively of this

Title; (f) hearings requested on
the temporary suspension or limitation of an operating certificate, pursuant to

Mental Hygiene Law, section 16.17 (b); (g) ICF/DD and specialty hospital second
level rate appeals, and second level fee and rent appeals for community
residences, pursuant to sections
681.12
(d), 680.12
(e), and
686.13
(f), respectively, of this Title; and
(h) petitions seeking declaratory rulings
pursuant to section 204 of the State Administrative Procedure Act. Notes
